segments.text: I think this scene is just too sad for words.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's so intent on her plate, missing everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading from the sink, forming a sad little lake on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in it, apron getting soaked without a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks vulnerable, reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble with those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar's open, tempting them into trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands eagerly, but it feels precarious for her too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is serene, mocking the indoor turmoil.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's depressing how routine turns to risk so fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry the stool will collapse any moment now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one's safe with that water and height.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wish someone would notice and make it right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could break hearts if it goes wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
